name: Poker Squares
description:
Shoemaker's Last proudly presents: Poker Squares!

Poker Squares is a solitaire card game where the object is to arrange the 25 randomly drawn cards on a 5x5 matrix in order to get the best possible poker hands...  both horizontally and vertically.  Title screen cards and The King character in the game are designed by the wonderful pixel artist Michael Myers.

The game requires a Tandy Color Computer 1, 2 or 3 with at least 64K RAM.  It is a mix of BASIC and assembly language graphics routines running in 128x96 resolution with 4 colors.  And multi-voice music!

To run the game, type RUN "RUNME" and press ENTER.  

To play, move the cursor using the arrow keys, and place a card using the spacebar.
